DocAttribute.Name: RelatedApproval
DocAttribute.Documentation: The approval that relates to another approval

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingApproval
DocAttribute.Documentation: The approval that other approval is related to.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: Textual description explaining the relationship between approvals.

DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: The human readable name given to the relationship between the approvals.
